appDesc.message: Add cards to Anki directly from Chrome

errorCannotcontext.message: Does not work on this page. Please use copy and paste instead.

errorCannotshortcuts.message: You cannot use shortcuts on this page.

errorEmptycloze.message:
Cannot add a cloze deletion card without clozes. Change model or add clozes to the field "$clozefieldname$".

This is done by clicking and dragging over words when the field is unfocused.

errorEmptyfirstfield.message: Cannot add card with an empty first field.

errorHiddendecks.message: It looks like you have excluded all decks in the options. Take a look under "Hide decks".

errorHiddenmodels.message: It looks like you have excluded all models in the options. Take a look under "Hide decks".

errorNoinfo.message: Add user info in the options.

errorLoginStatus.message: Can't login into Anki. Check your login & password in the options.

errorWronginfo.message:
Couldn't log onto AnkiWeb.
Make sure account info (ID and password) is filled correctly in the options.

opAuthor.message: by Igor Luzhanov, Hannes von Essen

opErrorwronginfo.message:
Cannot access your AnkiWeb account.
Make sure the above Account Info is filled correctly.

opHide1.message: If there are certain decks or card models you know you will never use with this extension, you can hide them from the drop-down menus to make it easier to select the decks and models you do use.

opShortcuts1.message: This extension supports shortcuts for quickly adding selected text to each field, without the need to first open the popup window.

opShortcuts16.message: and press "Keyboard shortcuts" at the bottom of the page.

opShortcuts3.message: Look up a word in you favourite online dictionary.

opShortcuts5.message: to add it to the front field.

opShortcuts7.message: to add it to the back field.

opShortcuts8.message: Select any extra information, such as example sentences, and add each further down in the same field with (again)

opShortcuts9.message: , or in a third field with

opTooltipaddtofield.message: Go to the extensions page to add a keyboard combination for this.

opTooltipopenpopup.message:
You haven't set any shortcut for opening the popup yet.
It's the action called 'Activate the extension'

tooltipClozefield.message:
CLOZE DELETION: Click and drag with the mouse to select clozes.
Hold shift to select multiple parts as one cloze.

tooltipHistory.message:
Quick History: When nothing is focused,
use the up and down arrow keys to browse through
recently used model-deck combinations.

tooltipLoadingbutton.message: Adding card... Press again to cancel.

tooltipShortcuts.message:
-------Shortcuts-------
Add card: Ctrl + Enter
Add card without closing: Shift + Enter

Edit in html: Ctrl + Shift + X
Surround selection with cloze: Ctrl + Shift + C

Up/Down: Switch between recently
used models/decks

tooltipTags.message: Anki tags are space separated, but this extension allows comma separation as well.

ankiErrorMsg.message: Unfortunately card saving is blocked by the Anki officials. Vote for the workaround here.

localSavingError.message: Your local storage is full. Please export your decks to file.

clearDeckAfterExport.message: Do you want to clear current deck after export?

confirmRemovingNonEmptyDeck.message: You're going to remove non-empty deck. Are you sure?
